title: News24.com | Coronavirus wrap: Baby dies as global cases near million, France death toll tops 4 000 and Latin America cases pass 20 000
description: Confirmed novel coronavirus infections around the world have approached one million as the pandemic spread at a 'near-exponential' rate, with a six-week-old baby becoming one of the youngest known victims.
content:
Keeping you up to date on the latest novel coronavirus
(Covid-19) news from around the world.
